title: I Killed Myself to be With My Dead Wife & Daughter
itunes:title: I Killed Myself to be With My Dead Wife & Daughter
itunes:subtitle: The Creepypasta Anthology
description:
The things we do for family...

***

Written by Christopher Maxim with guest narration by Joe Stofko, Nate Dufort, Danielle Hewitt, and Michelle Kane

***

Check out our reward tiers at patreon.com/creepypod

***

You can also subscribe to us on YouTube:

https://www.youtube.com/creepypod

***

Produced by Steve Blizin

***

Title music by Alex Aldea

***

Intro/Outro Narration by Joe Stofko


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
